mapper.select: SELECT EDU_TEACHER.ID, EDU_TEACHER.NAME, EDU_TEACHER.EDUCATION, EDU_TEACHER.CAREER, EDU_TEACHER.IS_STAR, EDU_TEACHER.PIC_PATH, EDU_TEACHER.STATUS, date_format(EDU_TEACHER.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') CREATE_TIME, EDU_TEACHER.UPDATE_TIME, EDU_TEACHER.SUBJECT_ID, EDU_TEACHER.SORT FROM EDU_TEACHER left join sys_subject on EDU_TEACHER.SUBJECT_ID = sys_subject.subject_id WHERE EDU_TEACHER.STATUS=0 ORDER BY EDU_TEACHER.SORT
